name: Date & Time
description: Get the current date and time from a public network source for accuracy.

settings.name: timezone
settings.label: Local Timezone
settings.description: IANA timezone (e.g. America/New_York, Europe/London). When set, results always include local time.

functions.name: get_current_datetime
functions.description: Get the current date and time. Returns accurate UTC time fetched from public web servers, plus a converted local time if a timezone is specified.

timezone.description: IANA timezone name (e.g. 'America/New_York', 'Europe/London'). If omitted, uses the configured local timezone or UTC.
